milestone.title: needstriage
milestone.description: Issues in needs for triage. Next step is diagnosis.

body:
**URL**: https://www.zssk.sk/ **Browser / Version**: Firefox 87.0 **Operating System**: Windows 10 **Tested Another Browser**: Yes Edge **Problem type**: Site is not usable **Description**: Buttons or links not working **Steps to Reproduce**: When you chose the train, you are then suppose to pick a seat in a car, but all seats are unclickable and displayed in dark grey color. While few seats are supposed to be displayed like this because they are reserved for handicapped passangers, the site in Firefox behaves as in every seat are reserved for them. This is not correct behaviour and in Edge it works as intended. But the weirdest part is when this occurs. My regular Firefox profile suffers from this. If I restart it in Safe Mode, it's still broken. Even if I disable tracking protection it's still happening. However, if I use completely new profiles it works correctly. But even then it's incosistent. During my first attempt to reinstall all my extension, it worked only for an hour and then it stopped. After my second attempt it worked during whole day, but stopped working literally over night. I couldn't pin-point the cause no matter how much I tried.
